title: Show full date on locked screen for Google Pixel 4a?
content:
My time and date cuts off on locked screen.  This isn't my photo, but I am having the same issues.  I've changed the font and it doesn't work.  Can anyone help?!?! Or am I stuck with this problem?
I've heard about using a third party launcher......what is all that tech talk about? Lol
Thanks in advance to anyone that replies.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
